settings.heading: Mi Air Purifier Improved Living
settings.description: Sharp Plasmacluter Air Purifiers Provide Comfortable Living Simple

settings.left_description2: Every pair of ELOMUS leggings has our patent pending FREELUXE Technology. Four layers of revolutionary material are designed into the gusset to help keep you cool, fresh and dry. Super lightweight and effective, you get the benefits of the coverage of a thong built into our leggings.  Ultra comfortable and underwear optional. No more bunching. No more friction. No more Visible Panty Lines. Supreme comfort and complete freedom to move without boundaries.

settings.feature1pera: Not just “low/medium/high” -- tap “smart” and uses smart sensors to detect the contaminates in your air and adjusts automatically.
Whether you deal with allergies, wildfires, or something else, we have custom filters built for YOUR environment.
As a premium produt, we use the latest motor and fan advancements to ensure low noise pollution.

settings.Right_description: You can still wear underwear with our leggings and use our FREELUXE technology as an added layer of protection. Supreme comfort no matter how to choose to move - yoga, pilates, or out running errands. It's a win - win.

settings.service_decription: Pay with VISA, MasterCard, or PayPal in our secure checkout.
Delivery is free of charge for standard shipping on orders over $300
Two years warranty on all of our bags. We promise that they will last.

settings.parallextHeading2: Clean Pure Air with a touch of a button
